message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1000000.  It's a great deal for both of us, as you'll be getting a valuable asset at a fair price. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $950000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm aiming for a price closer to my initial proposal.  I'm willing to come down to $975000. This price reflects the value of the product and leaves room for both of us to benefit. Let's make this deal happen.
